name: Coast Guard (itch)
description:
Our entry for the Buddy Jam 2!

Save the poor people that decided to go swimming on this sunny day! There are sharks and bombs trying to destroy you and the whole human population! 

Controls:

MoveArrow Keys ← ↑ → ↓BoostSpace
